meta.title: Flappy Bird AI
meta.description: Artificial intelligence used to play flappy bird, using NEAT Python.

blocks.title: Overview
blocks.text: This project uses the NEAT library in python. It really interests me and I find it quite fascinating. I decided to create a flappy bird game when I saw a YouTube video from TechWithTim, so I used that as an assistance when needed but wrote most of the code myself.

blocks.title: Technical
blocks.text: This project was my first introduction to neural networks. The python NEAT library does a lot of the heavy lifting for me, but was a great introduction to the basics. It was helpful to have a tutorial to look at when working on something completely new, but I was weary of copying things line for line as it's not a good way to learn. I will be looking at doing something of my own with the NEAT library soon, so look out :)
